Wordpress blog - Frontpage of the blog.

items.title: Book-tracking site
items.description: Hobby project. Wanted to track my reading of books so I decided to build myself a web-based tool using Django.

imgs.descr: Main tracking page - Reading history, currently reading and 'wishlist'.
Book View - Book details, review and possibility to add to personally created lists.
Profile view - Shows reading history of profile and other information of user.
Lists view - Shows all the lists that a user has created, whether they're public or not and books they contain.
Statistics View - Shows reading statistics of user.

items.title: HomeControl
items.description: Hobby project. Displaying temperature and humidity from sensors at my family home. Built using Django.

imgs.descr: Startpage - Showing current temperatures and humidity levels.
Graph view of one of the sensors.[Weekly-view]
Graph view of one of the sensors. [Daily-view]
